_description: A fragment introducing the narracio of Solomon in one manuscript of the Northern Homily Cycle — four lines

BodSelSup52.Transcription:
Heyr be gynys a story noȝte gadOf salamon þat was full
                    madffor weuis gart hym god forsakeAnd tyll mawmentis wrschyp
                    make
BodSelSup52.Note:
Narration itself missing; a folio appears to be missing between
                        195v and 196, on which begins 65.
BodSelSup52.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.42.
